title: Trace: Undefined Variable
story: A programmer tried to use a variable before defining it, causing a NameError. This is one of the most common beginner mistakes in Python.
instructions: Analyze the traceback and identify why the variable is undefined.

hints.text: NameError means Python couldn't find a variable or function with that name.
Check if the variable name is spelled correctly or if it was defined before use.

traceReading.stackTrace:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 2, in <module>
    print(result)
NameError: name 'result' is not defined

questions.question: Which variable name is not defined?
How would you fix this code?
questions.correctAnswer: Move the result = x * 2 line before the print statement
